Action.label: Setting No of Days to Fetch Fitness Data

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%aggregatedhealthdata Aggregated Health Data Aggregated Health Data will be returned as a JSON array, each object in the array corresponds to 1 day of data. The fields of the object will contain specific data for that day. Fields will not be present if there is no data for that type for that day.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%err Error Code If there's an error, contains an error code</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%errmsg Error Message If there's an error, contains an error message</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2></StringArray>

Action.Str:
Steps Today : %steps(1)
7 Days Avrg (excl today) : %7days_steps_mean
7 Days Avrg (incl today) : %7days_steps_mean_2

Action.label: To Find and Replace Erroneous Value
